analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule only lets appointees fire career employees they disagree with on a whim in order to have potentially unqualified and inappropriate one-sided views affect well-researched and evidenced-based policies by undermining the expertise of those in policy-influencing positions.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, due process, and the integrity of the merit-based system, indicating a strong stance against the rule's implementation.
